[OBJECT:CREATURE]

[CREATURE:VICTINI]
	[DESCRIPTION:A small, rabbit-like mythical Pokemon. Victini is said to bring victory to the Trainer that befriends it. It produces an infinite amount of energy within itself and can share it with others by touch.]

	[CASTE_NAME:Victini:Victini:Pokemon]

[CREATURE:MUNNA]
	[DESCRIPTION:A nearly spherical, quadruped Pokemon of indefinable basis. Munna is able to eat the dreams of people and Pokemon, as well as project these dreams by expelling Dream Mist. A person whose dream was eaten by a Munna will forget the dream's contents.]
	[NAME:Munna:Munna:Pokemon]

[CREATURE:SEISMITOAD]
	[DESCRIPTION:A bulky, bipedal toad-like Pokemon. The various lumps on its body have varying capabilities. The ones on its head can shoot a paralyzing liquid, while the ones on its hands can be vibrated to increase its punching power.]
	[NAME:Seismitoad:Seismitoad:Pokemon]
	[CASTE_NAME:Seismitoad:Seismitoad:Pokemon]

[CREATURE:DARUMAKA]
	[DESCRIPTION:A round Pokemon. When the flame inside its body burns, Darumaka is very active. It cannot calm down in this state, and thus becomes uncontrollable. As the flame shrinks, it falls asleep.]

[CREATURE:TYNAMO]
	[DESCRIPTION:A short, eel-like Pokemon. A single Tynamo does not generate much power, so groups of Tynamo move in schools and create a more powerful shock.]

	[CASTE_NAME:Tynamo:Tynamo:Pokemon]

[CREATURE:EELEKTRIK]
	[DESCRIPTION:An eel-like Pokemon. Eelektrik is a vigorous carnivore and has a good appetite. Upon spotting prey, it immediately attacks and paralyzes it, then coils around it and shocks it with electricity from its circular electricity-generating organs before eating it.]
	[NAME:Eelektrik:Eelektrik:Pokemon]
	[CASTE_NAME:Eelektrik:Eelektrik:Pokemon]
	[CREATURE_TILE:'~'][COLOR:1:0:0]
	[PETVALUE:150][APPLY_CREATURE_VARIATION:POKEBALL_WEAKNESS][TRAINABLE][PET]

	[BIOME:ANY_RIVER][MATERIAL_FORCE_MULTIPLIER:INORGANIC:DIVE_BALL:7:2]

[CREATURE:EELEKTROSS]
	[DESCRIPTION:An eel-like Pokemon that resembles a lamprey. It can use its arms to crawl out of the ocean and its sucker mouth to suck in prey. After latching onto its prey using its sucker mouth, it drags the prey into the ocean. It electrifies prey before eating.]

[CREATURE:DURANT]
	[DESCRIPTION:A insectoid Pokemon with a steel body. Durant is extremely territorial. It only lives in colonies and digs mazes underground designed to be as complicated as possible. It grows steel armor to protect itself from its natural predator, Heatmor.]
	[NAME:Durant:Durant:Pokemon]
	[CASTE_NAME:Durant:Durant:Pokemon]

[CREATURE:KELDEO]
	[DESCRIPTION:A quadruped, colt-like mythical Pokemon. Keldeo tends to cross the world, and often appears at beautiful watersides. It can walk across water by ejecting water from its hooves.]
	[NAME:Keldeo:Keldeo:Pokemon]
	[CASTE_NAME:Keldeo:Keldeo:Pokemon]

	[SOUND:PEACEFUL_INTERMITTENT:20:1000:VOCALIZATION:make your cry:makes its cry:a Keldeo cry]
	[APPLY_CREATURE_VARIATION:HEAVYBALL_WEAKNESS-2]
	[APPLY_CREATURE_VARIATION:FASTBALL_WEAKNESS]
